|rad1chip2 = Ralink;RT2820; |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = RP-SMA |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 3 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ==Specifications== Additional specifications, per the datasheet, follow... *Transmit Power **802.11b: 16~18 dBm **802.11g: 14~16 dBm **802.11n: 11~13 dBm *Receiver Sensitivity **802.11b: -80 dBm **802.11g: -70 dBm **802.11n: -70 dBm *Dimensions: [[Dimensions::34 mm x 191 mm x 155 mm|191 mm (H) x 34 mm (W) x 155 mm (D)]] *Weight (without antennas): [[Weight::434 g]] ==Links of Interest== *[http://www.planex.net/spec/router/MZK-W04N_Spec_Eng_v1.0.pdf Datasheet] *[http://wiki.openwrt.org/doku.php?id=oldwiki:openwrtdocs:hardware:pci:mzk_w04n On the '''OpenWrt''' wiki] :[[Ralink]] RT1310A CPU based, 4MB RAM, 32MB Flash, :[[Ralink]] RT2860RT Wi-Fi, [[Realtek]] RTL8305SC Switch *[https://www.amazon.com/gp/search?tag=wiki085-20&keywords=Planex_MZK-W04N On '''Amazon'''] ==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Firmware=== ====binwalk dump==== 
$ binwalk MZK-W04N_FW_v1.39_CE.bin

DECIMAL         HEX             DESCRIPTION
------------------------------------------------
0               0x0             CSYS header, little endian,  size: 131072
20              0x14            uImage header, header size: 64 bytes, 
   header CRC: 0x172BE5FD, created: Mon Dec 15 01:05:15 2008, 
   image size: 871208 bytes, Data Address: 0x40008000, 
   Entry Point: 0x40008000, data CRC: 0x7326EAE1, OS: Linux, 
   CPU: ARM, image type: OS Kernel Image, compression type: 
   bzip2, image name: "Linux-2.6.17"
84              0x54            bzip2 compressed data, block size = 900k
1048576         0x100000        Squashfs filesystem, little endian, 
   version 3.0, size: 2713551 bytes,  578 inodes, 
   blocksize: 65536 bytes, created: Mon Dec 15 01:04:56 2008
